name: Бухой Батя / Drunk Dad
description:
This game is in the genre of FPS and Horror. In the game "Бухой Батя / Drunk Dad" you have to meet dad who has drunk enough and wants to talk to you about life. The basis of the game is just protection with weapons and tactics. The game has a lot of locations in which you have to use all the tools at hand, and so on. In the game you need to shoot, run, hide and try not to die.
Weapons:
-Shotgun
-М27
-Stool
-Hammer
A huge number of levels and the boss in the form of"Бухой Батя / Drunk Dad". Try to beat the game and do not hear this cherished "What do you know."
